32.Name: «Beater»
32.Description: Reach floor 100 in Tower of Despair.

33.Name: Ultimate Lucky Student
33.Description: Win the gamble 5 times in a row.

34.Name: Ultimate Unlucky Student
34.Description: Lose the gamble 5 times in a row.

35.Name: Are you kidding me?!
35.Description: Get a draw in the gamble 3 times in a row.

36.Name: Initiation
36.Description: Win a battle against a player 1 time.

37.Name: Novice
37.Description: Win a battle against a player 10 times.

38.Name: Iconic
38.Description: Win a battle against a player 100 times.

39.Name: Unstoppable
39.Description: Win a battle against a player 1,000 times.

40.Name: Rampage
40.Description: Win a battle against a player 5 times in a row.
